title: 2002 Math OSP, Number 8
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A water drain is supposed to be made with a pipe with diameter of 10 cm. But only small pipes are available, those small pipes has a diameter of 3 cm. So that the capacity of the water drain isn't smaller than what is wanted, at least how many 3 cm pipes are needed to be used as the substitute of one 10cm pipe?"}]}]}

title: 2002 Math OSP, Number 9
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"An equilateral triangle, a circle, and a square has the same circumference. Between those three structures, which has the largest area? (The original question did not have choices)"}]}]}

title: 2002 Math OSK, Number 6
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5 goats finishes eating grass with the area of 5 times the size of a football field in 5 days. How many days would it take for 3 goats to finish eating grass with the area of 3 times the size of a football field?"}]}]}

title: 2002 Math OSK, Number 7
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For every real number "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x, y"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" applies "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x\\$y\\quad =\\quad xy\\quad -\\quad x\\quad +\\quad y"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(x+y)\\$(x-y)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" equals to..."}]}]}

title: 2002 Math OSK, Number 8
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"How many ordered pairs of positive integers (a, b) satisfy\n"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\frac { 1 }{ a }  + \\frac { 1 }{ b } = \\frac { 1 }{ 6 }. "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]}]}

title: 2002 Math OSK, Number 9
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For what value of a did the straight line "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"y\\quad =\\quad 6x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" cuts the parabola "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"y\\quad =\\quad { x }^{ 2 }\\quad +\\quad a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" right at one point?"}]}]}

title: 2003 Combination Sum
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\large\\dbinom{2003}1+\\dbinom{2003}4+\\dbinom{2003}7+\\ldots+\\dbinom{2003}{2002}=k(2^{2002}-1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" can be represented by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\dfrac{a}{b}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" when "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are coprime positive integers, find "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a+b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\mathrm{Let\ } S={{2003}\choose{1}}+{{2003}\choose{4}}+{{2003}\choose{7}}+\ldots+{{2003}\choose{2002}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"By Pascal's rule:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=\left[{{2002}\choose{0}}+{{2002}\choose{1}}\right]+\left[{{2002}\choose{3}}+{{2002}\choose{4}}\right]+\ldots"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\ldots+\left[{{2002}\choose{6}}+{{2002}\choose{7}}\right]+\ldots+\left[{{2002}\choose{2001}}+{{2002}\choose{2002}}\right]"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Again, by Pascal's rule:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=\left[2{{2001}\choose{0}}+{{2001}\choose{1}}\right]+\left[{{2001}\choose{2}}+2{{2001}\choose{3}}+{{2001}\choose{4}}\right]+\ldots"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\ldots+\left[{{2001}\choose{5}}+2{{2001}\choose{6}}+{{2001}\choose{7}}\right]+\ldots+\left[{{2001}\choose{2000}}+2{{2001}\choose{2001}}\right]"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We observe that
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sum_{k=0}^j{{j}\choose{k}}=2^j"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Subtracting from above:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S-2^{2001}={{2001}\choose{0}}+{{2001}\choose{3}}+{{2001}\choose{6}}+\ldots+{{2001}\choose{2001}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We may repeat the above procedure:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S-2^{2001}-2^{1999}={{1999}\choose{2}}+{{1999}\choose{5}}+{{1999}\choose{8}}+\ldots+{{1999}\choose{1997}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"After many repetitions:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S-2^{2001}-2^{1999}-2^{1997}-\ldots-2^1=0"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S=2^1+2^3+2^5+\ldots+2^{1999}+2^{2001}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{1}{2}S=2^0+2^2+2^4+\ldots++2^{1998}+2^{2000}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S+\frac{1}{2}S=\frac{3}{2}S=2^0+2^1+2^2+2^3+\ldots+2^{2000}+2^{2001}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2\left(\frac{3}{2}S\right)=3S=2^1+2^2+2^3+2^4+\ldots+2^{2001}+2^{2002}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3S-\frac{3}{2}S=\frac{3}{2}S=2^{2002}-2^0"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S=\frac{2}{3}(2^{2002}-1)=k(2^{2002}-1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k=\frac{2}{3}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2+3=\boxed{5}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            I used B.E 
 (1+x)^n = sum(i=0 to n)  nCi * x^i ;
and then substituted 1, w, w^2 in the equation and added them.
This gave me nC0 + nC3 + nC6 + .... ( = s1 , say )
and then i observed that the sum nC1 + nC4 + nC7 + ... is either +1 (if [n/3] is something even ) or -1 (if the same is something odd).
Since [2003/3] = 667 which is looking like an odd number, therefore, the sum should be s1 - 1, and then some calculation and the answer are in right front of you.

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

title: 2003 Math OSK, Number 1: Divisibility by 9
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Amongst the numbers 20000002, 20011002, 20022002, 20033002, how many are divisible by 9?"}]}]}

title: 2003 Math OSK, Number 2: Even Even Even Even
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"How many 4-digit numbers are there that are entirely made out of even numbers and not a multiple of 2003?"}]}]}

title: 2003 Math OSK, Number 3
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Today I am one third the age of my father. 5 years ago, I was one fourth of my father's age. What is my current age?"}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"According to the question the following equation can be formed:(Let the father's age be x)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1/3x-5=1/4(x-5)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x=45"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"so your age is 1/3x=1/3*45=15 "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"But you have turned 16:)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
